title: How do I refund an order token purchase
body: I bought the 280 order token border + icon but it is very lackluster for its price and I was wondering if I could exchange it for 2 orbs of order seeing as I don't have the skin nor even OWN riven for the border.

replies.body: I'm not entirely sure what the refund policy will be for those tokens, but there's not a lot I could do about that here on the boards regardless. Billing/refund questions are best left to the billing experts, so reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
